tsa::NotchWidrow Class Reference

Implement the lines removal using adaptive notch filters, with the Least Mean Squared method, Widrow's like. More...

Detailed Description

Implement the lines removal using adaptive notch filters, with the Least Mean Squared method, Widrow's like.
